main event: Military personnel observed small, high-speed UFOs maneuvering in the sky over Brackettville, Texas from 21 to 27 March 1952.
interesting points: On 23 March, an object appeared to be trailing sparks as it approached observers at high speed., The object abruptly stopped, hovered momentarily, and then accelerated away rapidly., Witnesses included reliable and experienced military personnel., The performance characteristics of the objects suggested they could not be conventional aircraft., The report was issued by Captain C. W. Tilaon of G-2, indicating a formal acknowledgment of the sightings.
sighted object: small, high-speed objects maneuvering in the sky
